data.title: Great place, fantastic bar tender, friendly customers
data.text: I stopped in one evening after work after seeing some excellent online reviews and referrals from some friends. I found the young female bartender to be very friendly, greeted me promptly. Offered a couple suggestions on what I might try it, at my request. Settled on a drink that was made very well. There were several other customers sitting at the bar that she seemed to know and proceeded to introduce them to me. Which I thought was very friendly and fun. I would definitely go back again

data.title: Great place!!!
data.text: Great bar/lounge.  The bar tenders are all amazing and attentive.  The owners are great people.  Very good drink specials.  The crowd is very adult behaved and dressed.

data.title: Classy clean bar
data.text: Went there early on a sat night, loud but not so loud you couldn't have a conversation. Drinks were reasonable and everyone was friendly!
